text: The Basij (, lit. "The Mobilization"), Niru-ye Moghāvemat-e Basij (, "Mobilisation Resistance Force"), full name Sāzmān-e Basij-e Mostaz'afin (, "The Organization for Mobilization of the Oppressed"),AEI Outlook Series: What Do Structural Changes in the Revolutionary Guards Mean? is one of the five forces of the Islamic Revolutionary Guard Corps (IRGC). ==References== Category:1980 establishments in Asia Category:Military of Iran
title: Basij
